headlines: Ubisoft shuts down a support studio, but Beyond Good & Evil 2 is still in development
Game industry layoffs lead to questions about project's future
Stay tuned for updates on the game's progress
final_production_data.tts_script: With the gaming industry's recent rash of layoffs, Ubisoft shuts down a support studio. However, Beyond Good & Evil 2 is still in development.

original_raw_news.original_title: Beyond Good & Evil 2 is somehow still under development
original_raw_news.original_summary: With the gaming industry's recent rash of layoffs, Ubisoft shuts down a support studio, Beyond Good & Evil 2 is somehow still under development.
